title: System Settings
subtitle: Configure platform parameters and recommendation algorithms

platform.title: Platform Configuration
platform.platformFeeDesc: Percentage of creator earnings retained by the platform
platform.minWithdrawalDesc: Minimum amount creators must accumulate before withdrawing
platform.maxUploadSizeDesc: Maximum file size allowed for uploads
platform.autoApproveDesc: Automatically approve new content without review
platform.maintenanceModeDesc: Put the platform in maintenance mode

recommendation.title: Recommendation Algorithm
recommendation.enabledDesc: Show personalized content recommendations to users
recommendation.algorithmDesc: Algorithm used to generate content recommendations
recommendation.maxRecommendationsDesc: Maximum number of recommendations to show per user
recommendation.refreshIntervalDesc: How often to refresh recommendations for each user
recommendation.personalizationWeightDesc: Balance between personalized recommendations and trending content (0% = all trending, 100% = fully personalized)
